Detailed Description

Michael's hash map implementation with support of item removing.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename GC , typename KEY , typename VALUE , typename PAIR_TRAITS , typename TRAITS , class ALLOCATOR >
template<typename T , typename FUNC >
bool cds::map::michael_map::details::michael_map_gc< GC, KEY, VALUE, PAIR_TRAITS, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >::find ( const KEY &  key,
T &  data,
FUNC  func 
) [inline]

Finds the key key and returns its data in data.

If key found the function calls user-defined function func with parameters: 

                            void func( T& data, const VALUE& itemValue )

where itemValue is the item found by key. The user-defined function copies the item's value itemValue or its part to data. The map guarantees only that the item found cannot be deleted while func works. The user-defined function func should take into account that concurrent threads may change the item value.

Returns true if the key is found, false otherwise
